install.name: Content - RokBox
install.author: RocketTheme, LLC
install.description: To be used with a RokBox enabled RocketTheme Joomla! template. Syntax is {rokbox}link{/rokbox}. If you want the image to be part of an 'album', you can use the syntax {rokbox album=|albumname|}link{/rokbox}. To provide text descriptions, please use the syntax {rokbox title=|your description|}link{/rokbox}. To specify a thumbnail, use the syntax {rokbox thumb=|thumbnail_link.jpg|}link{/rokbox}. If you want to use a text link, you can specify the text using syntax: {rokbox text=|your link text here|}link{/rokbox}. You can also use album, title, thumb and text in the same tag.

param.name: remote_sizes
param.label: Try to load remote images sizes

param.name: thumb_ext
param.label: Thumbnail Extension
param.description: If your image is called someimage.jpg, your thumbnail should be called someimage_thumb.jpg in the same directory for example. Change the extension here

param.name: thumb_class
param.label: Thumbnail CSS Class
param.description: album is the default name used in RocketTheme Joomla! Templates for the Slimbox class

param.name: thumb_dir
param.label: Custom Thumbnail Directory
param.description: Custom directory where auto-generated thumbnails are generated - above option must be Yes for this to be used

param.name: thumb_width
param.label: Thumbnail width in px
param.description: This is the width of the generated thumbnail if one is not found with the set thumb extension

param.name: thumb_height
param.label: Thumbnail height in px
param.description: This is the height of the generated thumbnail if one is not found with the set thumb extension

param.name: thumb_quality
param.label: Thumbnail quality in %
param.description: This is the quality of the generated thumbnail if one is not found with the set thumb extension
